description: Adds a player to a game session and creates a player session record. Before a player can be added, a game session must have an ACTIVE status, have a creation policy of ALLOW_ALL, and have an open player slot. To add a group of players to a game session, use CreatePlayerSessions. To create a player session, specify a game session ID, player ID, and optionally a string of player data. If successful, the player is added to the game session and a new PlayerSession object is returned. Player sessions cannot be updated.   Available in Amazon GameLift Local.
